t: Bargain Town
s: I went to see what they had. Nice furniture and many items are 1/2 ticket price! Great Sales and Nice sales reps · I went to Bargain Town Furniture in Garland in search of an affordable living room set. The entire staff was friendly. I did not feel hounded or harassed.

t: BT Furnishings closing all D-FW stores after 35 years in business
s: March 12, 2024 - BT Furnishings is going out of business and closing its stores in Dallas, Arlington, Garland and Plano. The company has been in business for 35 years, promoting its showrooms as an affordable place to shop for brands such as Ashley Furniture, Leather Italia, Steve Silver and Wellspring Mattresses.
